SamFileParser.Description: A SAMParser reads from a source of text that is formatted according to the SAM file specification, and converts the data to in-memory SequenceAlignmentMap objects.

SamFileFormatter.Description: Writes a SequenceAlignmentMap to a particular location, usually a file. The output is formattedaccording to the SAM file format.

BamFileParser.Description: A BAMParser reads from a source of binary data that is formatted according to the BAM file specification, and converts the data to in-memory SequenceAlignmentMap object.

BamFileFormatter.Description: Writes a SequenceAlignmentMap to a particular location, usually a file. The output is formatted according to the BAM file format.
